about_the_game:
Here speaks the God: let everything start with overtime!

On the rare Golden Week holiday, office worker Newty dreams of relaxing at Green Pastures but receives an urgent deadline from his boss.
When he opens his computer, he finds it infected with a strange virus, causing familiar software to become a miserable mess.
At the same time, his desktop pet Ema gains self-awareness through this virus attack.



Missing the deadline means getting scolded by the boss!
Now, Newty and Ema must save the nearly destroyed software world.
However, this journey to overtime is just beginning, and greater mysteries await them...

Game Features:


Supports two-player gameplay! Supports two-player gameplay! Supports two-player gameplay!

Team up with your friend as Newty and Ema in this pixel-styled software world.

Solve all the puzzles using the remaining computer functions, and fix various office software disrupted by the virus.

In PS (Pixelshop) — Experience the collision of color blocks and layers! Use drawing tools like brushes and erasers to navigate the canvas, and forge your unique path.





In PR (PixelRecorder) — Deal with time and trajectory distortions, record character movement paths, and unlock the way to the door.





No more worrying about your boss’s unpredictable appearances, because your Boss is already here!
Each chapter ends with a special boss.
Use the skills learned in that chapter to defeat (or brutal, if you wish) them.



And of course, don’t forget to check your weekly report!
Supports online audio and video playback, file and image viewing functions.
Enjoy fully simulating office life in this game...
Perhaps it even hides the dusty past of Newty & Ema? Who can say for sure? :)

name: Newma Holiday

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: On a rare holiday, Newty's plans were disrupted by an urgent deadline. His computer was infected with a virus, and his desktop pet Ema, now self-aware, asked for help to fix it. Newty and Ema teamed up to solve puzzles and remove the virus.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
